help.item: Provide the site name.It is used in the home page of the portal
Provide the name of the company or organization hosting the portal
Set the options for the publication of the results: NOSESSIONIDFOLDER
Give a priority to your task.
Use this location as default in task definition
Select one of the available protocol for your publish location
provide the server name (e.g. myserver.mydomain.com) or IP address (e.g. 222.222.222.222)
Provide the port used by this location. It may depend on the protocol
Provide the path for the publication of the results in the format /myroot/mypath
Provide the username for the authentication (some protocols do not require this information)
Provide the password for the authentication (some protocols do not require this information)
Include Land, Cloud, and Water pixels
Save or submit your task here.
